original_title: 君の美しい顔を精液と唾液で穢してあげる。
overview: Tsumugi Akari returns to Tokyo after many years and decides to stay over in the house of his uncle.  Perhaps not fully understanding that things changed a lot, she is now an adult beautiful woman, and her uncle is a lonely man who descended into madness.
title: I Will Soil Your Beautiful Face With My Semen And Slobber. Tsumugi Akari
